resources.string:
This is BasiliskII port for Android by tomaswoj, works in progress. WIP02_b30092011.
Uses SDL by pelya. Kudos go to Basilisk team, E-Maculation, MyApple.pl, MacintoshGarden and last but definitely not least - Darek Mihocka.
See http://droidmac.blogspot.com
Contact me at: tomaswoj@gmail.com
